name: Wardrobe Revamp Voucher
description:
For your personal wardrobe revamp we’ll either visit you at your home or you can bring key items from your wardrobe along to our studio. We’ll spend the next 4 hours helping you:

	- organise your wardrobe into style zones &   
  capsules 
- identify your unique personal style 
- assess what styles and shapes suit you best and
  what to get rid of 
- identify gaps in your wardrobe and suggest
  additional items to fill them

name: Personal Shopping Voucher
description: Our personal shopping experience lasts around 4 hours and we’ll either go shopping with you or on your behalf. Before we hit the shops we’ll do lots of preparation, carefully consulting with you to understand: Your style personality The image you want to project & the looks you wish to achieve Your body shape Your lifestyle Colours you look good in and feel most comfortable wearing The budget you’re working to We’ll choose brands and designers that will enable you to create a distinct look that reflects your style and personality. Most of all, we guarantee you’ll learn a lot and have an enjoyable and rewarding experience.

name: Top-to-toe Makeover Voucher
description: This complete package represents fantastic value for money as it includes the following services: Colour consultation Wardrobe revamp Personal shopping trip Personal make-up masterclass Personal hair style & colour consultation

name: Gift Voucher - £100
description:
Why not buy a Style Specialists Gift Voucher for a friend, partner or colleague? Our vouchers make a wonderful gift and they can be redeemed against any of our image services or any items from the on-line shop.

	Our vouchers look gorgeous and are presented in a beautiful wallet.
